unnormalised: Arre, havamaan ahaval sangta 15/08-ak zhorachem paus poddtolo! Asha asa India Gate-ar Svotontr Diwsacho karyakrom pausan buddonk favo na. Havaman khatem 32°C astolo mhunn sangta, mhunnun udok piyet ravat bhai!

text: Arre, havamaan ahaval sangta 15/08-ak zhorachem paus poddtolo! Asha asa India Gate-ar Svotontr Diwsacho karyakrom pausan buddonk favo na. Havaman khatem 32°C astolo mhunn sangta, mhunnun udok piyet ravat bhai!
